long_description: The Horny Toad Butte jacket hits the sweet spot between warmth and agility to keep you comfortable on around-town adventures to the corner cafe or local hardware store. Organic cotton outer shell has a mini herringbone pattern that gives the fabric subtle texture and strong character that gets better with age. Jacket is insulated with lightweight polyester fill and lined with a recycled-polyester/wool blend to keep you warm while out and about. Corduroy collar can be zipped up all the way to keep cold air out. Fleece-lined hand pockets warm your fingers. Stash your essentials in the snap-flap chest pockets and the stealthy interior zippered pocket. The Horny Toad Butte jacket has adjustable button tabs at the hem.
short_description: The Horny Toad Butte jacket hits the sweet spot between warmth and agility to keep you comfortable on around-town adventures to the corner cafe or local hardware store.
